# News Summary - 2025-02-07_16-20-07\n\nHere's a summary of today's news:

**Politics and Government**

*   [Donald Trump](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBLNXM4TmZTSGMyak10dlRvNUYzV0daQzFxTW1mamp6NWdSS3VvTUVfam9EZE1OM0JiWnhzODlqN1V3RGlGTjVJbHVWWmh2UEZoMjNhYUtVbUN6UdIBX0FVX3lxTE9nWmJmek9sUTRQVnhteDJuWF9CUE01N1NMekdiWW9MYmRidEF2aXhiWVh1X1Z6bnZEZnpKam1KSm1WSlVJX2haa180aUVuMVctSWZ6bVhsOC12MzlFTDRn?oc=5) has announced he will be revoking [Joe Biden's](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBLNXM4TmZTSGMyak10dlRvNUYzV0daQzFxTW1mamp6NWdSS3VvTUVfam9EZE1OM0JiWnhzODlqN1V3RGlGTjVJbHVWWmh2UEZoMjNhYUtVbUN6UdIBX0FVX3lxTE9nWmJmek9sUTRQVnhteDJuWF9CUE01N1NMekdiWW9MYmRidEF2aXhiWVh1X1Z6bnZEZnpKam1KSm1WSlVJX2haa180aUVuMVctSWZ6bVhsOC12MzlFTDRn?oc=5) security clearances, ending intelligence briefings in what is being described as a payback move.
*   A judge is set to block the [Trump administration](https://news.google.?oc=5) from placing 2,200 USAID employees on leave at midnight.
*   [House Republicans](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxOT0FZWi0yelplYnZjaWN6TGk0VTFfbjZtMUM5R3hxNFBETUxtTXlpZjg1VW1wV1BDaGo5Q3RjTk13YUs3RU9zVnlJQ09ycUFNYi1hNmN3WktRcnZ0ckJINGFrS3ZfYi1JMXBTallYQVdBblozbjBlaUJXdEhDX1R0dmw5d21zZXVNSVc1dGE1M1Q4OU43VEYtdUpQN0xIVy1IM0ZpSkJkRktJQQ?oc=5) are closing in on a budget deal after a meeting with Trump.
*   [Trump](https://news.google.?oc=5) has signed an order delaying tariffs on de minimis imports from China.

**Business and Economics**

*   [Elon Musk](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMigAFBVV95cUxPLWFOZll4bjQwRjJjRE9peHFUdm9IRXNVbGVUczNWa1pLQURVaU9fU3BlcUFvOEZPcE1nSzU0LW8wZW5RVFVNdmZnQllMd2JpM0tfeUtRbWRCeU5qOEtkekM5bm9yYW5zM2Flb2otdngtZXpBUVBNWHdqNWU1WmhpeQ?oc=5) intends to rehire a Treasury DOGE staffer who was previously linked to racist posts, following endorsements from Trump.
*   The Transportation Department has suspended the EV charger program.
*   A new [jobs report](https://news.google.?oc=5) indicates a hiring slowdown, with companies reportedly acting as though "they're in a recession."
*   [Cracker Barrel](https://news.google.?oc=5) fires back at [Waffle House](https://news.google.?oc=5) for adding a surcharge to eggs

**Technology**

*   New [Apple](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilgFBVV95cUxPQ0h5MHk2VVB6TUt1STRrV3Q4VklDOHpmOWFfc2xfWFl6MVpwT3NxWUNfWnl2WUI2NXVfd0hubUNmSlNsU1FDY0NKQVlOZjlLU01taGFHb05lWS1FZmgtd0Y1SWlIbE5BTFdqTkNyMFNJWEZuRE9FNDBtbFpxVnYyQ2huN242MFRXa3A1QUZDMnB5VDhzd3c?oc=5) products are expected to launch next week, with a long-awaited overhaul of the [iPhone SE](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilgFBVV95cUxPQ0h5MHk2VVB6TUt1STRrV3Q4VklDOHpmOWFfc2xfWFl6MVpwT3NxWUNfWnl2WUI2NXVfd0hubUNmSlNsU1FDY0NKQVlOZjlLU01taGFHb05lWS1FZmgtd0Y1SWlIbE5BTFdqTkNyMFNJWEZuRE9FNDBtbFpxVnYyQ2huN242MFRXa3A1QUZDMnB5VDhzd3c?oc=5) nearing release.
*   [iOS 18.4 beta](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiaEFVX3lxTE5CWDlmaUFoOWtlbmI1VTJXNVhLMlRMZm4xZ2Z5NHhmbG5taHpGZmZxcVRlblloMFQzVzZFZDVOZEdCVU9yMnFfU0xwRHRSeV9qalYtSHFaeENLakRVNnZIMktjYktBY0E5?oc=5) with expanded Siri capabilities is reportedly coming soon.
*    A review of the [OnePlus 13](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMic0FVX3lxTE1PNGx6YldEWi0wMjRQUU5nODNqdXMwY3JTTXdCeWpBOHpLRkpiZDFoR3JtbWJibG1JNFM4Yi1ueGY5R005OWN0cUdvZkNpWFBMVEhNYXZ1MFh0OXM3VlEzUU5YQkVJYXJ0eHNrTFg3eHJZN1k?oc=5) has been released.

**World Affairs**

*   A [missing commuter plane](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxONWY2bWhmZm1zR2ZtV3pUWTN6bmhYTDF3X1BPSUhwRFRSYTV6NkxfeGNaZjQzRXZXYUJxeTZUNk52U1NUaWJZYmEzX2hyemZZanFYX0YtYThMUFBzWC1WbkU4Slp1c0V1VmJRV1IxRkw5UXNrOFEyUkNkUGItVFlTcFJjdk1wenVOUFRYRTdRUGw2T05namQ2ODBOYUpKLTlhQ2c?oc=5) was found crashed on Alaska sea ice, with all 10 people aboard confirmed dead.
*   In Argentina, alarm has been raised as a [river runs blood-red](https://news.google.?oc=5).
*   Hamas has named the next [hostages](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBqWGpmb2IyVFBFRjJTdU1ZRi1GRnlxbDZiVFktMXl3Y2hmbmg5TC1ZcjJyLVhqTi1zeTQ3ckNfbkNDUGlfeW5zZDMyUllDNV9ERkw2T09pOUNiZ9IBX0FVX3lxTE1OSlNsc3B5NWFtdUdXV0pGdEQ3R2FEWHg0MEpCR2xJTVdCZklGT3ZjUnpvR3R0WGhwNlFaLTBuN1hmWndrNkFxYmxBbC1sSHl1bmxNX3c0dlVqdnJPZnNz?oc=5) to be released, amidst claims that Israel is violating the deal
*   A small plane crashed into a street in Brazil, resulting in the [deaths of two people](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikgFBVV95cUxQZW9GbGw1YmhZN1hITnZJV3VIMHM0c0RPbThDWE93S2dPcFVyYlA4NFVWb3pYTkduWjVJNjhRNEJ3dl9ZZGFsYUs4bHR0cUVWMnhEU3FZOGJLMWQ1M3IzVEhmLVdrSWFqVm5lUktkVkI1cDc0UlVvM3BTM1NpSDZoTkQ5ZkZwdWJXUENzZGRSX1poUQ?oc=5) on board.

**Weather**

*   [Tiger Woods](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxPNXljQVJObnItajFFTHFVV1RWc1VGZy1leEF2RDBtUjFERjdNT3NxM2VEZnEzSGNQd0laZzhPOFBCdkpJYWhCeFRpU2Y4bkRGZV9DY2QzNGVfYkRORlRiLW83d1d4QXVzUmkzdWR1ZTdSMXVXZk5iNl8tWDNCTFEweU5LU2cyYnZKcVkwWlZrQTV3ZXpaU2FZV2NORUU0YUdNSnFZdw?oc=5) has committed to The Genesis Invitational.

* A newly discovered asteroid has a slightly higher risk of hitting Earth.
*   [Doctors' visits for the flu](https://news.google.?oc=5) are the highest in 15 years, the most since the swine flu pandemic.
* Live poultry markets in [New York City](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijgFBVV95cUxNSU01M1F6cndkZjZ4Ukd4S1I2UUZQSTNiODVSTE5iSjgzVUlFZm05MUV5SE9wR3pIaUg5cXhXRFVySFBHNGxtd1lYdDd4dmNJQ1BrNlFtWWdFR0ludDN5amgtdnM0TllwVTdRMFZDTWVnZldHemd6Z21FOFgwUXhUWlVZNW5wLVdpX0JyTkhB?oc=5) have been ordered shut because of an [avian flu](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijgFBVV95cUxNSU01M1F6cndkZjZ4Ukd4S1I2UUZQSTNiODVSTE5iSjgzVUlFZm05MUV5SE9wR3pIaUg5cXhXRFVySFBHNGxtd1lYdDd4dmNJQ1BrNlFtWWdFR0ludDN5amgtdnM0TllwVTdRMFZDTWVnZldHemd6Z21FOFgwUXhUWlVZNW5wLVdpX0JyTkhB?oc=5) outbreak.
* A [measles ](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxNN3d1MGpqTUU1YTlrQThuYUJ3ajJubVVJTlVkcEpCNF83S1hXa0d0dEZkMG9PRV9ISVM0RGRvdXlucTgyTHZNNUJ3RS1SRTYza0ljcXlyazlJeWtkczZyejZqQk1VLTBxczlwMGJqeERZTFpNb0lKTmJOR0N4eUYxSU52dTdac2xUTnBaOVpjb29GS1ktNEUwMDZXVi1KRTk2RVZGQXdpYVI?oc=5)outbreak has erupted in one of Texas’ least vaccinated counties.

**From Wikipedia's Main Page:**

*   **Featured Article:** Lise Meitner (1878–1968), an Austrian-Swedish nuclear physicist who was instrumental in the discovery of nuclear fission and protactinium (Full [article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lise_Meitner)).
*   **Did You Know:** Louis Malet de Graville began a successful career at the center of French politics after his father was captured by the English (coat of arms pictured).
*   **In The News**:  Eleven people are killed in a mass shooting at an adult education centre in Örebro, Sweden. At the Grammy Awards, "Not Like Us" by Kendrick Lamar wins Record of the Year (pictured) and Beyoncé's Cowboy Carter wins Album of the Year.
